mcq.statement: Change the narration: The old lady said to her son" Is it not your duty to help me in my old age"?

options.a: The old lady asked her son if it was not his duty to help her in her old age
options.b: The old lady asked her son if it was not his duty to help him in her old age
options.c: The old lady asked her son That it was not his duty to help her in her old age
